attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With seemingly no one other than blinkered Brown-ites swallowing new-labour spin anymore, u turns and failures on policy, I call upon the PM to call a general election so that the people can have their say on who they want to steer our nation through these difficult times, for which the government have made little or no provision!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
